title: Potato pizza with chicken and rocket
ingredients: ['500g small new potatoes, scrubbed', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 red onions, halved and very finely sliced', '100g pancetta, diced', '175g button mushrooms, sliced', '1 tbsp fresh rosemary leaves', '2 ready-made pizza bases, each about 22cm across', '6 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', 'TO SERVE 250g cooked, skinless chicken breast (plain or smoked), shredded, 85g rocket, 25g fresh Parmesan']
